com.risk.team.controller

Class RiskDiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.controller.RiskDiceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class RiskDiceController
extends java.util.Observable
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, java.io.Serializable
    RiskDiceController class contains the methods used in dice view, load attack screen, move armies, cancel move, cancel throw, continue Dice Roll, attack dice value, defence dice value and start dice roll.
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
